trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
